attributes.action: Review evidence of ownership of The Parthenon Marbles held in the British Museum
attributes.background: An independent review into the legitimacy surrounding the claimed ownership of the Parthenon Marbles held in the British Museum. Request for a full chain of title to be reviewed by an independent international committee and reunification should the committee find illegitimate acquisition.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for the British Museum, not the UK Government.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550304.
